metadata.title: CVE-2016-5598 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Unspecified vulnerability in the MySQL Connector component 2.1.3 andearlier and 2.0.4 and earlier in Oracle MySQL allows remote attackers toaffect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via vectors related toConnector/Python.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5598` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-mysql.connector - 2.1.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-python package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.5-1').
